title: Uncle Si Can't Stand These Ridiculous Dress Codes
description:
Martin gets Si fired up about silly dress codes. John-David talks about all the places he's been kicked out of. Phil Robertson's reaction to the news of Martin's twins is priceless. Si explains why he doesn't want anything for his upcoming birthday. Phillip and Si are in awe of the pilot they met on their trip to Memphis. And Si has a brilliant theory about a fan who doesn't want to attend a wedding with his girlfriend on his birthday.
-
